content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: green_banner
inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "red_sandstone_wall", "quantity": 4, "index": 24}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 6, "index": 35}, {"type": "stone_stairs", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 57, "index": 38}, {"type": "poppy", "quantity": 30, "index": 40}]
thought: To craft a green_banner, I first need to craft green_wool. Green_wool can be crafted by placing a green_dye next to a white_wool. I will first move the white_wool from slot 21 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 1 with quantity 1
